Check out the new Indoor Mode for the BLK2FLY! Indoor Mode accomplishes three things: it does not require GNSS, obstacle avoidance is reduced to 1.5 meters, and it flies slower for maneuverability, which enables it to get closer to objects and fly in tight spaces. This long sought-after feature opens new scanning possibilities in indoor spaces such as arenas, plants, warehouses, and other facilities. So if an airborne SLAM platform to bridge the data gap from the outdoor world to the indoors is something that you've been looking for... Send me a message and we'll talk about this exciting new update. Let's make the BLK2FLY work for you! #BLK2FLY
